Posts.EditableText: Fight off laser gun-wielding assassins while tunneling through a 3-D cube in search of the teleportation pad to escape. The only way to stay healthy is to mine omelet ingredients and cook them into a healthy meal. This is more of a text-based video game than a text adventure. It's built in Quest 5.8 and uses timers and macros. Have fun!
Posts.HTML:
Fight off laser gun-wielding assassins while tunneling through a 3-D cube in search of the teleportation pad to escape. The only way to stay healthy is to mine omelet ingredients and cook them into a healthy meal.

This is more of a text-based video game than a text adventure. It's built in Quest 5.8 and uses timers and macros.

Have fun!
